projects.title: Goober OS
projects.description: A linux like "Web OS" command line operating system made for a make-a-thon competition. </br> We won in our year category!

projects.title: Pokemon-Terrainium
projects.description: Pokemon Terrainium is a fan made Pokemon game made in RPG Maker XP, My friend and I are working on right now.

subContent.title: Gifted - HA
subContent.description: A custom made plugin for Pokemon Terrainium, that adds a chance for the hidden ability to every gifted pokemon, like a starter or other pokemon that you get for free.

subContent.title: Pokemon-Terranium Biomes
subContent.description: A custom made plugin for Pokemon Terrainium, that adds biomes to the game, used for battle machanics
